author: StarKiller22515
title: We need better May The Fourth Promotions
review: Back in the day I remember when we got very cool and exclusive promotions for May The Fourth. Now we get small little okay builds, or we get something of a bad mini figure. The prints are nice on this and it would be a really cool desk model, but there is one problem, there is a stud on the bottom of BB-8 that doesn't allow him to sit straight. They were so close to making something really cool but then they didn't. I wouldn't recommend buying this on EBay or Bricklink cause it will most likely be overpriced.
